item.title: Hierarchies In a Hakyll Blog
item.description: Creating hierarchy in a blog is a useful technique. It allows you to have different sections by type of content. It lets users navigate by their interests quickly. It makes your blog organized. My need for a hierarchy came when working on another blog - Daily Reading Notes. That blog involves notes on books I read daily. Since each book has multiple reading notes, I wanted to allow two forms of navigation: by a grouping of all notes for a particular book and by posted date.
